text: and when He had given thanks, He broke it and said: “Take, eat; this is my body that is being brokenThe eclectic Greek text currently in vogue omits ‘take, eat’ (following 8.3% of the Greek manuscripts) and ‘broken’ (following some 2% of the manuscripts); and so NIV, NASB, LB, TEV, etc. do the same. on your behalf; do this in remembrance of me.”
